# value class

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/json/value
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T01:17:03.313397

---

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/JSON }` |

## Members

This class has functions, but no data members.

### Functions

| Function Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`AsObject`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/json/value/asobject) | Retrieve an object value or fail if value is not a json object |
| [`AsArray`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/json/value/asarray) | Retrieve an array value or fail if value is not a json array |
| [`AsInt`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/json/value/asint) | Retrieve an integer value or fail if value is not a json number |
| [`AsFloat`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/json/value/asfloat) | Retrieve a float value or fail if value is not a json number |
| [`AsString`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/json/value/asstring) | Retrieve an object value or fail if value is not a string |
| [`AsNull`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/json/value/asnull) | Retrieve an object value or fail if value is not null |
